trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to and from an object by applying the integer as an index to a list of objects.
trans-unit.target: 將整數當做索引套用至物件清單，藉此在整數與物件之間來回轉換。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to bind a property to alternating values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>屬性繫結至替代值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you do the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>有替代藍色和淺藍色背景，您可以執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> and add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>並加入藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和淺藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>至其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and assign the converter you created to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Style>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>，繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>並指派您要建立的轉換子<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and uses two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> objects to alternate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A> of the items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，並使用兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>物件以替代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A>的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The integer to use to find an object in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 整數，用來在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 屬性中尋找物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結目標屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Converts an integer to an object in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> list.
trans-unit.target: 將整數轉換成 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 清單中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object that is in the position of <paramref name="o" /> modulo the number of items in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" />.
trans-unit.target: 位於 <paramref name="o" /> 除以 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 中項目個數所得餘數的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to find in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 屬性中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結目標屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> list to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 清單中的物件轉換成整數。

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="o" /> if it is in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" />, or –1 if o does not exist in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" />，則為 <paramref name="o" /> 的索引，如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values" /> 中沒有 o，則為 –1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> returns when an integer is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 當整數傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> 方法時，取得 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 傳回的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of objects that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> returns when an integer is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 當整數傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter" /> 方法時，<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 傳回的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to bind a property to alternating values, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A> property contains the objects that are assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>屬性繫結至替代值，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>屬性包含指派給屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to have alternating blue and light blue backgrounds, you add a blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> and a light blue <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>若替代藍色和淺藍色背景，您將加入藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>和淺藍色<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter.Values%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and uses two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> objects to alternate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A> of the items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，並使用兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>物件以替代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A>的項目。
